events.message: I am filing a claim for the car accident that happened yesterday on Main Street, where my vehicle was hit from behind.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident after reviewing the initial report and assessing the nature of the incident.
An agent has been assigned to handle your vehicle collision claim to provide assistance and guide you through the process.
Your claim for the car accident has been formally acknowledged. We are committed to processing it as soon as possible.
Please submit the photos of the vehicle damage, police report, and medical reports related to the accident for claim processing.
All requested documents including the collision photos and police report have been submitted successfully for further examination.
Our investigation team has begun reviewing the circumstances and facts surrounding your car accident claim.
The investigation into your auto accident claim is now complete. The findings support your account of the collision.
We have proposed a settlement amount that covers the damages and related expenses for your vehicle after the accident.
You have provided feedback on the proposed settlement, expressing satisfaction with the offer and the overall claims process.
Your claim has been approved based on the investigation and submitted documents. We will proceed with payment shortly.
The payment for your auto accident claim has been issued to your bank account as per the approved settlement terms.
The claim has been officially closed following the payment issuance and no further actions are required from your side.
